message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the problem of fine-grained image classification and retrieval by leveraging textual information along with visual cues. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories such as computer vision (cs.CV), information retrieval (cs.IR), computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM). Among these, computer vision (cs.CV) is the most likely category as the paper deals with image understanding and retrieval. Information retrieval (cs.IR) is also likely as the paper leverages textual information for image retrieval. Computational linguistics (cs.CL) is another possible category as the paper uses a PHOC descriptor to construct a bag of textual words. Machine learning (cs.LG) is also possible as the paper proposes a novel approach for multimodal representation. Finally, multimedia (cs.MM) is another possible category as the paper deals with both visual and textual modalities.
